item.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology
House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

cdata.text: This resolution elects designated Members of the House of Representatives to the Committee on Agriculture; the Committee on Armed Services; the Committee on Education & the Workforce; the Committee on Ethics; the Committee on Foreign Affairs; the Committee on Homeland Security; the Committee on House Administration; the Committee on Natural Resources; the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology; the Committee on Small Business; the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure; and the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

This resolution elects designated Members of the House of Representatives to the Committee on Agriculture; the Committee on Armed Services; the Committee on Education & the Workforce; the Committee on Ethics; the Committee on Foreign Affairs; the Committee on Homeland Security; the Committee on House Administration; the Committee on Natural Resources; the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology; the Committee on Small Business; the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure; and the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
